page.title: 05THORNEY BAY CARAVAN PARK
page.content: { Down Thorney Bay Road there is a big Caravan Park, where people can stay for their holidays. I think there were about a thousand caravans on the site. We walked thorugh the camp from the sea wall.It is mainly old people that we saw with their carvans in the camp, because the school holidays hadn't started. Outside the camp there is a row of trees which are used as a wind break. There is a lake that flows thorugh the camp. Some of the caravans are old and tarmac roads go through the site.Beside the roads there are signs that say "No Skateboarding" In the camp there is a row of carvans for sale or hire.I know that because me and my dad had a look thorugh the window of the caravan. We didn't buy the caravan because we thought it was too expensive.
